title: The Little Mermaid - Broadway Cast Recording 2008
description:
IF YOU LIKE IT, BUY IT

The Little Mermaid is a stage musical produced by Disney Theatrical, based upon the animated 1989 Disney film of the same name, which was based on the classic story of The Little Mermaid by Hans Christian Andersen. The musical&#039;s book is by Doug Wright, music by Alan Menken and lyrics by the late Howard Ashman (written for the film) and new lyrics by Glenn Slater.

The musical had a pre-Broadway tryout in Denver, Colorado in September 2007, with Broadway previews beginning in November 2007 at the Lunt-Fontanne Theatre, previously the home of Disney Theatrical&#039;s Beauty and the Beast, which closed in July 2007 to make way for the new production. The Little Mermaid opened on January 10, 2008.

Act I 
Overture - Orchestra 
Fathoms Below - Eric, Grimsby and Sailors 
Daughters Of Triton - Mersisters 
The World Above* - Ariel 
Human Stuff* - Scuttle and Gulls 
I Want The Good Times Back* - Ursula, Flotsam, and Jetsam 
Part of Your World - Ariel 
Storm at Sea - Orchestra 
Part of Your World (Reprise) - Ariel 
She&#039;s In Love* - Mersisters and Flounder 
Her Voice* - Eric 
The World Above (Reprise)* - Triton 
Under The Sea - Sebastian and Sea Creatures 
Under The Sea (Reprise) - Sebastian and Sea Creatures 
Sweet Child* - Flotsam and Jetsam 
Poor Unfortunate Souls - Ursula 
 Act II 
Positoovity* - Scuttle and Gulls 
Beyond My Wildest Dreams* - Ariel, Carlotta, and The Maids 
Les Poissons - Chef Louis 
Les Poissons (Reprise)* - Chef Louis and Chefs 
One Step Closer* - Eric 
I Want The Good Times Back (Reprise)* - Ursula 
Kiss The Girl - Sebastian and Animals 
Sweet Child (Reprise)* - Flotsam and Jetsam 
If Only (Quartet)&#039;*&#039;* - Ariel, Eric, Sebastian, and Triton 
The Contest* - Grimsby and Princesses 
Poor Unfortunate Souls (Reprise)* - Ursula 
If Only (Reprise)* - Triton 
Finale - Ariel, Eric, and Company 
 
*These songs written for the musical.
